name: UpdateCloudflareAccount
description:
Update details of a Cloudflare account.

Use this tool to update the information of an existing Cloudflare account linked with Datadog. It should be called whenever modifications to a Cloudflare account are required.

parameters.name: cloudflare_account_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Cloudflare account to be updated.

parameters.name: cloudflare_api_key
parameters.description: The API key for the Cloudflare account, required for authentication.

value_schema.description: The API key of the Cloudflare account.

parameters.name: cloudflare_account_email
parameters.description: The email associated with the Cloudflare account. Required if using an API key instead of a token.

value_schema.description: The email associated with the Cloudflare account. If an API key is provided (and not a token), this field is also required.

parameters.name: cloudflare_account_name
parameters.description: The name of the Cloudflare account to be updated.

value_schema.description: The name of the Cloudflare account.

parameters.name: allowed_resource_types_for_metrics
parameters.description: An array of resource types ('web', 'dns', 'lb', 'worker') to allow for metrics collection.

value_schema.description: An allowlist of resources to restrict pulling metrics for including `'web', 'dns', 'lb' (load balancer), 'worker'`.

parameters.name: zone_allowlist
parameters.description: A list of zone identifiers to restrict which metrics can be pulled for Cloudflare.

value_schema.description: An allowlist of zones to restrict pulling metrics for.

parameters.name: json_api_type
parameters.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Always use `cloudflare-accounts`.

value_schema.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `cloudflare-accounts`.
